title: How to watch Girls: stream every season online
author: kieron-moore
summary: Make Lena Dunham’s comedy your next binge
article: Following a group of girl friends attempting to shape their careers while navigating relationship woes and body hang-ups, Lena Dunham's comedy drama is described as ground-breaking, with ample to relate to. Keep reading to find out where to watch Girls online where you are for its six season run from 2012 to 2017.

Set in the backdrop of New York City, Girls stars Dunham as aspiring writer, Hannah, who is trying to adapt to being financially independent after her parents unceremoniously cut her off. Her friends, Marnie, Jessa, and Shosanna struggle through their twenties, juggling career problems, narcissism, addiction, and difficult relationships along the way.

Girls has been praised for its humorous take on modern New York life and its refreshingly realistic portrayal of women and their relationships with each other. It originally aired on HBO and is now available on streaming services such as HBO Max. Our article will explain how you can watch Girls online, whether you’re in the US, UK, Australia, or Canada.

headers.3: Where to watch Girls: stream every season online in Australia
